alert.note: Alert for Crockett (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued October 03 at 6:59PM CDT until October 03 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: The National Weather Service in San Angelo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... South central Crockett County in west central Texas... * Until 800 PM CDT. * At 659 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Ft Lancaster, or 8 miles southeast of Sheffield, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of south central Crockett County, including the following locations... Ft Lancaster, The Intersection Of Ranch Road 2083 And Highway 405, and The Intersection Of I-10 And Highway 405. This includes Interstate 10 between Mile Markers 345 and 357. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
